subtasks: Explain common reason for fig tree not fruiting (hormonal balance)
Discuss importance of plant hormones in fruiting
Differentiate between summer pruning and winter pruning effects
Demonstrate proper thinning cuts vs. heading cuts for fig trees
Explain the impact of severe pruning (heading cuts) vs. thinning cuts on hormone balance
Provide examples of how excessive pruning can affect fig tree fruiting
Advise on protecting fig trees from winter damage for better fruiting
Emphasize the role of patience and correct pruning techniques for successful fruiting
